[#87](c87#c-87) Resulta que la OTAN lleva expandiendo su membres√≠a sin parar desde su creaci√≥n y mas cuando se uni√≥ EEUU en 1948.
En 1952 - Se unieron Grecia y Turqu√≠a
En 1954 - Rusia propone unirse y le dicen que no.
1955 - Se une Alemania Occidental
1958 - Francia se sale acusando a EEUU de papel hegem√≥nico.
1982 -Se une Espa√±a.
1989 - La Uni√≥n Sovi√©tica se desintegra.
1995 - OTAN lanza su primera operaci√≥n militar en Bosnia y Herzegovina contra los serv√≠os acusados de cometer cr√≠menes contra la humanidad (Israel tiene derecho a defenderse).
1999 - OTAN entra otra vez en guerra para parar la limpieza √©tnica Kosovar en Yugoslavia ya que se est√°n cometiendo cr√≠menes contra la poblaci√≥n civil.
1999 - Rep√∫blica Checa, Hungr√≠a y Polonia entran en la OTAN
2003 - Despu√©s del 11S la OTAN entra en Afganistan e Iraq aunque los terroristas del 11S eran Saud√≠s.
2004 - Bulgaria, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Rumania y las ex rep√∫blicas sovi√©ticas Estonia, Letonia y Lituania
2009 - Croacia y Albania se unen a la OTAN.
2017 - Montenegro se une a la OTAN.
En 2008 Bush ya dijo que quer√≠a incorporar Ucrania a la OTAN, Zelensky aprob√≥ como estrategia de seguridad nacional la entrada de Ucrania en la OTAN. Y que EEUU se escude en James Baker si dijo que la OTAN no se iba a expandir pero que no qued√≥ reflejado en el acuerdo escrito me suena a la confusi√≥n que tuvieron los Palestinos, Sirios que ayudaron a los Brit√°nicos a luchar contra los Otomanos con la promesa de conseguir la independencia que les hab√≠a prometido UK. Y que yo apoye a Ucrania no quiere decir que apoye al imperialismo yanqui, quiere decir que no quiero tener a Putin cerca.
Y que yo apoye a Ir√°n no quiere decir que apoye el integrismo isl√°mico, quiere decir que me duele el genocidio del pueblo palestino y los iran√≠es parecen los √∫nicos que se oponen m√°s all√° de algunas palabras, por eso les apoyo.

Si mi inter√©s es la ca√≠da de Israel y del Imperio Use√±o, por tanto, hago como Churchill y, si Ir√°n plantea enfrentarse a Israel, como m√≠nimo hablar√© bien de ellos, en mi caso, en men√©ame. Y eso no significa que yo apoye ciegamente al r√©gimen de los Ayatol√°s.
Las mentes simples intentan que la gente se posiciones en dos bandos de la forma m√°s maniquea posible. Pero el mundo es complejo: el que hoy es tu aliado contra un enemigo dif√≠cil (por ejemplo la URSS y UK lo fueron contra la Alemania Nazi), ma√±ana puede pasar a ser tu enemigo.

author: Jessica Stewart
title: MrBeast‚Äôs TeamSeas Initiative Pulls 34 Million Pounds of Trash From the Ocean
text: Nearly three years ago, MrBeast and TeamSeas started an initiative to raise $30 million to remove 30 million pounds of ocean trash. A few days ago, they announced that they had surpassed their goal, having pulled 34 million pounds of trash from the sea. It's a stunning achievement that shows the best side of content creation and pulling together online communities for the greater good. With over 300 million subscribers to his YouTube channel, MrBeast has a lot of sway, which is evident in the results. The fundraiser started in 2021, with people encouraged to donate $1 to clean up one pound of trash. But people did much more than that. Not only did they donate, but they also got out, formed teams, and started cleaning local beaches and waterways. And, thanks to MrBeast's online popularity, other content creators got involved, with over 400,000 contributing videos related to the cause. All the effort paid off, and according to TeamSeas, a third-party source verified the outcome. This isn't MrBeast's first foray into philanthropy. The American YouTuber, who began posting videos when he was just 13, also runs the Beast Philanthropy channel , where he's done everything from helping those with sight issues receive surgery to adopting an orphanage. He's also worked on environmental issues before. In October 2019, he teamed up with fellow YouTuber Mark Rober for TeamTrees and vowed to raise $20 million by January 1 to plant 20 million trees. That goal was surpassed before the self-imposed limit and, as of last month, over 24 million trees have been planted. While some are critical of MrBeast's over-the-top videos and the motivations for his fundraising, there's no doubt that he's making an impact on the planet, one click at a time. And while the original TeamSeas goal is over, people are being encouraged to donate and support Ocean Conservancy and The Ocean Cleanup to keep the movement going. International collaborative fundraising campaign TeamSeas has surpassed its original goal and cleaned up 34 million pounds of trash from the ocean. The initiative was started in 2021 by popular American YouTuber MrBeast. View this post on Instagram Over 400,00 content creators made videos to support the fundraiser, which asked for $1 to clean up one pound of trash. Ordinary people formed teams and competed to see who could do the best cleanup. The success of TeamSeas proves that online communities can come together for the greater good. As of today all 34,000,000 pounds of trash from TeamSeas has been removed from the ocean and verified by a third party üòÄ ‚Äî MrBeast (@MrBeast) [July 16, 2024] Related Articles: Japan Has a Competitive Sport for Trash Collecting Called ‚ÄòSpoGomi‚Äô Man Spends Over 1,000 Days Straight Cleaning Up Trash in His Local Parks Man Cleans Up Beaches With Custom-Built Grabber and Remote-Controlled Trash Can People Are Picking Up Trash and Sharing Before-and-After Photos for the ‚ÄúTrashtag Challenge‚Äù

author: world today news
title: Expulsion of Estrela da Amadora Goalkeeper Leads to Arouca Turnaround and Rout
text: Expulsion of the star goalkeeper unbalanced the game for the visitors, who in just a few minutes achieved the turnaround and thrashing numbers in Reboleira In a flash, everything changed drastically in Reboleira, in a game that remained balanced and with the result registering an equality and would end up dictating a rout that, until then, at no point seemed to be foreseen in the history of the first clash between Estrela da Amadora and Arouca , but which would be 4-1 in favor of the wolves of Serra de Freita. The home team went into the break with an advantage thanks to an effective use of the dead ball, more precisely a corner taken precisely for Kialonda Gaspar to drive in, in the 11th minute. However, the second half would prove to be very different, with Arouca coming in better and needing just over two minutes to equalise, with a finish from Rafa Mujica‚Äôs first touch, which motivated the visiting team to seek victory. turnaround until Wagner ruined everything. Moments after handling a cross, Estrela‚Äôs goalkeeper touched Mujica‚Äôs face, in a gesture that the refereeing team sanctioned as aggression, leading to his immediate expulsion and awarding a penalty. From then on, another game was watched at Reboleira. Debutant Edmilson would even defend the maximum punishment moments later, but would not prevent the home team‚Äôs collapse from then on, in a mix of galvanization on the part of Arouca, who saw themselves in numerical superiority with around twenty minutes to play, and emotional lack of control by Estrela, who were outnumbered and disorganized and ended up being punished not only with a comeback, but also with a rout in the final minutes. In the 77th minute, Jason made it 1-2, following an incomplete save by Edmilson, and Estrela would not be able to react again, taking advantage of Arouca who scored twice more. First, in a new top-up, this time by Javi Montero, after a ball defended by the home keeper to the post, and already in added time, at 90+1, by Bukia, with ease in the face of a star defensive line that was already committed to the your misfortune on tonight‚Äôs date. With the robust result achieved, Arouca reached ninth place and precisely Estrela da Amadora ‚Äì just like Casa Pia and Boavista, who will still compete in the matches related to this journey -, remaining undefeated since Daniel Sousa‚Äôs arrival at the club. technical command. 90+1‚Ä≤: Golo do Arouca! Andre Bukia, just introduced, finished easily after being assisted by Cristo Gonz√°lez who, as in the previous goal, took advantage of the lack of concentration in the opposing defense to score the goal. Additional time: 7 minutes. 87‚Ä≤: Double substitution at Arouca, with the entry of Yusuf Lawal and Pedro Santos following the departure of David Sim√£o and Morlaye Sylla. 85‚Ä≤: Double substitution at Arouca, with Michel and Andre Bukia replacing Jason Remeseiro and Rafa M√∫jica. 80‚Ä≤: Arouca goal! Javi Montero appeared opportunely in reloading Edmilson‚Äôs defense to the post, confirming the 3-1 and practically sentencing the victory for the visitors. 77‚Ä≤: Golo do Arouca! A situation of motivated attack in the face of an uneasy defense due to recent events. Cristo Gonz√°lez overtook several opponents and risked a shot, which was incompletely saved by Edmilson, allowing Jason Remeseiro to reload. 75‚Ä≤: Cristo Gonz√°lez wastes the penalty that followed, allowing the save to Edmilson, the goalkeeper who had entered the game seconds before and also blocked the rebound as best he could. 74‚Ä≤: Double substitution at Estrela da Amadora, with the entry of Edmilson and Kikas following the departure of Ronald and Andr√© Luiz. Judge Jo√£o Pinheiro considered Wagner Dida‚Äôs action to be an aggression, after handling a cross taken from the right, he touched Rafa M√∫jica‚Äôs face and therefore provoked a penalty. 71‚Ä≤: Red card for Wagner Dida (Estrela da Amadora). 66‚Ä≤: Replacement at Estrela da Amadora, with the entry of Pedro S√° and the departure of Jo√£o Reis. 66‚Ä≤: Yellow card for Morlaye Sylla (Arouca). 58‚Ä≤: Double substitution at Estrela da Amadora, with the entry of Manuel Keliano and Ronaldo Tavares following the departure of Vit√≥ and L√©o Jab√°. Everything was done well in Arouca‚Äôs goal: both Tiago Esgaio‚Äôs first-time cross and M√∫jica‚Äôs clinical finish. 47‚Ä≤: Golo do Arouca! Rafa M√∫jica, who had already successfully targeted the opponent‚Äôs goal in the first half ‚Äì but failed ‚Äì this time finished well and materialized a reaction from the visiting team that already deserved equality. Start of the second part Estrela da Amadora starts the second half with an advantage and in possession of the ball. Interval! Estrela da Amadora 1, Arouca 0 Kialonda Gaspar‚Äôs stunning header, following a good entry into the game by Estrela da Amadora, decided the match in favor of the tricolors at half-time. Arouca tried to react and equalize and had good situations to do so, first with a ball on the woodwork by Jason Remeseiro, and then with a goal invalidated by Rafa M√∫jica for a charge on the Estrela goalkeeper. The visitors were therefore unable to shoot and will try to do so in the second 45 minutes. 45+1: Tiago Esgaio appears in the reload after a previous block by Estrela‚Äôs defense, but shot over the top. Additional time: 5 minutes. 40‚Ä≤: Yellow card for Rafa M√∫jica (Arouca). 39‚Ä≤: Arouca manages to put the ball in the back of the net, in an aerial dispute between Rafa M√∫jica and Wagner, but the move was invalidated by the Spanish striker‚Äôs attack on the Estrela goalkeeper. 32‚Ä≤: Arouca this time very close to a draw! Jason Remeseiro, who has been one of the most unconformist members of the visitors, received the ball lying to the right and shot at the crossbar, with the ball still hitting the pitch in an area close to the goal, but not going in. 31‚Ä≤: Andr√© Luiz again creates danger, but wastes it: good individual movement from the Brazilian, from outside to inside, before shooting from the edge of the area, but just over the crossbar. 29‚Ä≤: Estrela returns to targeting the opponent‚Äôs goal after the good initial period, which earned him the goal. This time, L√©o Cordeiro was unable to create any problems at the opponent‚Äôs goal, shooting wide. 27‚Ä≤: With no space to penetrate the star‚Äôs area ‚Äì Kialonda Gaspar has been intractable so far in leading the local defense ‚Äì Arouca seeks to use the mid-range, through Morlaye Sylla. The Guinea Conakry [international](https://www.world-today-news.com/tag/international/)‚Äôs shot went just wide, but was always controlled by Wagner. 23‚Ä≤: Again Christ, but also without precision in taking a direct free kick in the frontal zone. The ball went very high. 20‚Ä≤: Arouca‚Äôs first attempt to react to the disadvantage, but without danger. Cristo Gonz√°lez looked for a shot at the edge of the area, but it was weak and towards Wagner. 12‚Ä≤: Golo do Star from Amadora! The tricolors took the lead through a corner taken from the right by Jean Felipe into the heart of the area and through Kialonda Gaspar, who rose higher than the entire visiting defense and launched the party in Reboleira. 5‚Ä≤: First dangerous situation of the meeting, and immediately blatant! Good work from L√©o Jab√° on the right, followed by a precise cross for Andr√© Luiz, who shot first time and just over the top when he was in a position to do better. Start of the match! The first possession of the ball belonged to Arouca, who presented themselves with their traditional kit ‚Äì yellow shirt and blue shorts -, just like Estrela da Amadora, in tricolor: red, white and green. The two teams enter the field, accompanied by the Estrela da Amadora anthem. The three teams conclude the warm-up period on the Jos√© Gomes Stadium pitch; the refereeing team and Arouca have already retired to the changing rooms, while Estrela is still carrying out exercises in the midfield allocated to them. Less than half an hour before the opening whistle, the stands at Est√°dio Jos√© Gomes are already beginning to look well composed, a situation worth noting considering that the match takes place in the evening on a Thursday, in uninviting temperatures. It seems that the assistance at Reboleira will not disappoint‚Ä¶ Coach of Arouca: Daniel Sousa. Arouca substitutes: Jo√£o Valido, Yusuf Lawal, Trezza, Puche, Mat√≠as, Michel, Andre Bukia, Vitinho and Pedro Santos. AROUCA: Ignacio de Arruabarrena, Bogdan Milovanov, Javi Montero, Nino Galovic and Bogdan Milovanov; Ebou√© Kouassi, Morlaye Sylla and David Simon (c); Christ Gonzalez, Jason Remeseiro and Rafa Music. Referee: Jo√£o Pinheiro (AF Braga); Assistants: Bruno Jesus and Luciano Maia; 4th Referee: Pedro Ramalho (AF √âvora); WAS: Rui Costa (AF Porto); AVAR: Nuno Manso (AF Braga). Estrela da Amadora Coach: Sergio Vieira. Substitutes for Star from Amadora: Edmilson, Ronaldo Tavares, Gustavo Henrique, Pedro Sa, Manuel Keliano, Kikas, Ndour and Manuel Figueiredo. STAR FROM AMADORA: Wagner Dida, Kialonda Gaspar, Erivaldo Almeida and Nkanyiso Shinga; Jean Felipe, Leo Cordeiro, Vito and Joan Reis: Leo Jaba, Ronald Pereira and Andre Luiz. There are already initial teams! The team that travels from Serra de Freita enters the field with just one more point than the penultimate placed team, divided between Vizela, Rio Ave and Gil Vicente, but could finish as ninth placed, equal on points precisely with their opponent for tonight. , Estrela, as well as Casa Pia and Boavista, who have 16 points at the start of this round. Arouca is also going through a good moment, having not yet suffered any setbacks since the change in technical command; the whiplash resulting from Daniel Sousa‚Äôs entry seems to have fully paid off, with two wins and two draws and the last defeat increasingly distant, a month and a half ago‚Ä¶. and the prospect of a victory in the first visit in its history to the Jos√© Gomes Stadium could enable a significant jump in the league table. Given this ability to keep the team stable despite the physical constraints that have plagued the squad, the Reboleira emblem is positioned in a comfortable ninth place and just two points behind the seventh placed team, Famalic√£o, who this Friday will have a complicated trip to Est√°dio da Luz to face Benfica. Despite having been invariably forced to make changes to its starting eleven over the last month due to injuries, which have reached more than a dozen athletes and currently number around eight, Estrela has not lost for over a month, in a a meeting in which, in fact, they even tied in regular time, having been defeated after extra time by Vizela and consequently removed from the Portuguese Cup. As far as defeats in regular time are concerned, Estrela hasn‚Äôt officially lost in over a month and a half. Estrela da Amadora and Arouca will look to say goodbye to the 2023 calendar year with a victory. In the case of the Tricolores, if confirmed, it would represent the fourth consecutive match without losing, an achievement worthy of note taking into account the large number of injuries that have affected the star squad. The Jos√© Gomes Stadium, in Reboleira, will host an unprecedented duel in national [football](https://www.world-today-news.com/tag/football/) this Thursday night (8.15 pm): Estrela da Amadora and Arouca have never met at an official level before and will face each other for the first time in an important contest for the 15th round of the League. BOLA is in the historic tricolor venue and will follow, in detail, the development of the challenge. Stay with us! Goodnight! 2023-12-28 22:15:00 #Expulsion #upsets #balance #sends #Arouca #rout #Reboleira #Abola.pt #Abola.pt

author: VNExplorer
title: Plus de 800 euros : cet automobiliste re√ßoit une facture √©norme pour avoir recharg√© sa voiture un mois
text: Un automobiliste doit payer r√©gler 800 euros pour un mois de recharge de son v√©hicule √©lectrique. Apr√®s s‚Äô√™tre branch√© √† une borne de recharge de la m√©tropole de Toulouse, un automobiliste a re√ßu des factures de 400 et 800 euros. Et pour cause, le prix du kilowatt/heure √©tait factur√© entre 3 et 4 euros. Une facture qui a de quoi donner des sueurs froides. Il ne s‚Äôagit pas d‚Äôune facture d‚Äô√©lectricit√© ou de gaz astronomique, re√ßue par des administr√©s ces derniers mois, mais de celle d‚Äôune recharge pour une voiture √©lectrique. Un automobiliste toulousain a eu la d√©sagr√©able surprise de se voir r√©clamer 240 euros pour une simple recharge √† l‚Äôautomne dernier, raconte La D√©p√™che. Pourtant, ce Toulousain avait branch√© sa voiture √©lectrique, une Kia EV6, sur les bornes Aliz√© du r√©seau Toulib√©o de Toulouse M√©tropole. Probl√®me : en septembre et octobre 2023, il re√ßoit des factures de 400 et 800 euros ! Il comprend rapidement pourquoi de telles sommes lui sont r√©clam√©es : ¬´En regardant le d√©tail, plusieurs recharges √©taient factur√©es √† des tarifs exorbitants, 3 ou 4 euros le kilowatt/heure, contre 0,40 ou 0,60 euro en temps normal.¬ª La faute de la M√©tropole ? L‚Äôautomobiliste contacte Toulib√©o qui va lui r√©pondre que les tarifs r√©clam√©s n‚Äô√©taient pas de son fait. Le r√©seau ¬´n‚Äôavait factur√© qu‚Äôune vingtaine d‚Äôeuros¬ª. La faute revient donc √† Kia puisque le Toulousain utilise une carte Kia Charge Plus. √Ä lire aussi V√©hicules √©lectriques : les bornes de recharge en nombre suffisant sur la route de vos vacances ? Le constructeur Kia rejette la faute sur le conducteur Sauf qu‚Äôen se tournant vers Kia, il va avoir une dr√¥le de surprise. Le constructeur sud-cor√©en va lui faire une r√©ponse laconique : ¬´Ils m‚Äôont dit que je devais consulter l‚Äôapplication Kia Charge avant chaque recharge pour conna√Ætre les tarifs appliqu√©s √† chaque borne.¬ª Derni√®re solution pour le jeune homme : se tourner vers sa banque. Cette derni√®re va accepter de lui rembourser les sommes d√©bours√©es et se tourner vers Kia. √Ä lire aussi Voiture √©lectrique : et si l‚Äôon pouvait recharger la batterie en roulant ? Si la banque ne parvenait pas √† avoir gain de cause, elle lui r√©clamerait les sommes dues. En tout √©tat de cause, personne n‚Äôest revenu vers lui, et morale de l‚Äôhistoire, l‚Äôautomobiliste a revendu son v√©hicule √©lectrique‚Ä¶ pour un thermique !

author: Fred Pennic
title: Biolinq Secures $58M to Advance Continuous Glucose Monitoring Patch
text:
What You Should Know:
‚Äì Biolinq , a provider of precision wearable biosensors for metabolic health secures $58M led by Alpha Wave Ventures . The round will include participation from Niterra‚Äôs corporate venture capital fund jointly operated with Pegasus Tech Ventures and existing investors RiverVest Venture Partners , AXA IM Alts, Global Health Investment Corporation , Aphelion Capital , Senvest Management , Features Capital and Taisho Pharmaceutical. J.P. Morgan served as a placement agent to Biolinq in connection with the financing.
‚Äì The funding will propel Biolinq towards completion of a pivotal clinical trial in the US and subsequent FDA submission for its innovative continuous glucose monitoring (CGM) patch.
Biolinq‚Äôs Intradermal Sensor
The Biolinq patch offers a unique approach to glucose monitoring:
Simple and Discreet: Worn on the upper forearm, the patch features an intuitive display for easy blood sugar level tracking. Intradermal Sensors: Tiny sensors placed just under the skin measure glucose levels, eliminating the need for finger pricking. Multi-Analyte Potential: Biolinq‚Äôs sensor array is designed to go beyond glucose monitoring, offering the potential for broader metabolic health insights in the future. Redundancy and Reliability: The design incorporates multiple sensors on a single chip, ensuring data accuracy and reliable performance. Biolinq‚Äôs intradermal sensor is currently an investigational device, awaiting FDA clearance. This new funding positions Biolinq to complete the crucial clinical trial phase and potentially gain FDA approval later this year.
‚ÄúOur technology approach enables access to a coveted, metabolically active compartment of the skin for biosensing without the use of introducer needles or bleeding,‚Äù said Rich Yang, CEO, Biolinq. ‚ÄúOver the past decade, our team has been pioneering a new biosensor platform designed to inform and inspire, with a mission to reach more people that are in need of simple solutions to improve metabolic health.‚Äù

author: Kyle Anzalone
title: US Slow Walking Zelensky‚Äôs Request to Join NATO
text:
US and NATO officials said that the US and Germany are blocking Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky‚Äôs request to join the North Atlantic alliance. Kiev has been pushing for NATO to accept Ukraine as its 33rd member as a part of Zelensky‚Äôs victory plan.
Four NATO and US sources speaking with Politico told the outlet that Washington and Berlin are ‚Äúslow walking.‚Äù Zelesnky calls for Kiev to be immediately added to the alliance. Hungary and Slovakia also oppose Ukraine‚Äôs ascension into the Washington-led bloc.
US Ambassador to NATO Julianne Smith explained the White House‚Äôs position to Politico. ‚ÄúThe alliance has not, to date, reached the point where it is prepared to offer membership or an invitation to Ukraine,‚Äù she said.
In a Facebook post , Hungarian Prime Minister Victor Orban described Zelensky‚Äôs victory plan as ‚Äúterrifying.‚Äù
German Chancellor Olaf Scholz argued that Ukraine should not be admitted to the alliance because NATO should seek to avoid a direct war with Russia. ‚ÄúWe are making sure that NATO does not become a party to the war, so that this war does not turn into a much greater catastrophe,‚Äù he said last week.
In 2008, Washington led the NATO alliance in promising Kiev that Ukraine would one day become a member of the bloc. However, the Kremlin argued that Ukraine joining NATO would present a national security threat to Moscow.
Over the following 16 years, Washington orchestrated two coups in Kiev, removing leaders with ties to Moscow for governments that sought to deepen ties with the West. Additionally, NATO increasingly treated Kiev as a de facto member state with arms transfers and war games on Ukrainian soil as well as the Black Sea .
In 2022, arguing that Kiev‚Äôs ties to NATO have become too much of a threat for Moscow to ignore, Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered the invasion of Ukraine.

author: Staff Correspondent
title: Year-end splash with every purchase of OPPO A77
text:
In a gesture of gratitude to its valued customers, OPPO is delighted to announce a year-end surprise for OPPO A77 smartphone buyers.
Until 31 December, every purchase of the OPPO A77 will come with a complimentary special edition backpack, adding an extra touch of style and convenience to the festive season, read a press release.
The OPPO A77 has been a popular choice among consumers for its powerful features, premium design, and impressive charging capabilities. As a token of appreciation for the continued support from OPPO enthusiasts, the inclusion of a specially designed backpack aims to enhance the overall user experience and make the holiday season even more memorable.
OPPO A77 boasts a sleek Premium OPPO Glow Flat-Edge Design with a thickness of 7.99mm Ultra-Slim Body, housing all the class and style in this device. The Side Fingerprint Unlock provides easy, one-handed usability. Stand out amidst the crowd with the eye-catching colorways and premium textures of the design that reflects the user‚Äôs lifestyle.
Charge the phone worry free with the 33-watt SUPERVOOC as its advanced charging technology has the phone ready without any delays for your day. Constant texting or watching your favorite dramas will be more exciting with the confidence of charging protection and safety features.
The limited-edition backpack features a modern and trendy design, providing users with a stylish and functional accessory for their everyday needs. Whether heading to work, school, or a weekend getaway, OPPO A77 users can now carry their essentials in a backpack that complements their lifestyle.
This special offer is available for a limited time only, and customers are encouraged to visit authorized OPPO retailers or the official OPPO store to take advantage of this exclusive promotion. OPPO remains committed to delivering innovative products and memorable experiences to its customers.

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - 'An eye-opener': Teenage boy killed by shark at Aussie beach
text:
Summary by Ground News Emergency services were called to Ethel Beach in Innes National Park with reports of a shark attack at 1.30pm on Thursday. There, at the popular surf beach hemmed in by towering cliffs, they recovered the teenager's body. Local surfer Luke Sykora spoke of his shock over the tragedy. Police are preparing a report for the coroner. Share menu More

author: Dagospia
title: massimo fini: ma √® mai possibile che nessuno riesca a non dire mai che romelu lukaku √® una pippa? - Sport
text: Massimo Fini per il Fatto Quotidiano - Estratti Che cosa vi avevo detto della Svizzera? La Germania ha pareggiato solo all‚Äôultimo minuto. Gli svizzeri sono fortissimi a centrocampo con Xhaka, un de Bruyne cui manca solo il tiro, e Freuler. In difesa hanno Akanji, centrale del City. Il problema della Svizzera √® all‚Äôattacco, dove il centravanti √® Embolo che era molto forte fisicamente a vent‚Äôanni ed √® altrettanto forte fisicamente a ventisette, solo che in questi anni non ha imparato a giocare a calcio. Una sorta di Lukaku in chiave minore. I tedeschi soffrono di un‚Äôassenza e di una presenza. Sono un Bayern senza Robert Lewandowski (...) La presenza negativa √® quella di Toni Kroos. Saggiamente si era ritirato dopo la finale di Champions vinta dal Real Madrid (sono almeno dieci anni che il Madrid ha culo) dove era curato dall‚Äôaustriaco Sabitzer che gli tolse ogni linea di passaggio e, non bastandogli, spadroneggi√≤ per tutto il campo. Anche la Svizzera ha un problema, ma non riguarda i giocatori ma l‚Äôallenatore Murat Yakin. Ai recenti Mondiali in Qatar la coppia centrale di difesa era formata da Akanji e Nico Elvedi, centrale del Borussia M√∂nchengladbach, e port√≤ molto bene: 1-0 col Camerun, 0-1 col Brasile e 3-2 con la Serbia. Ma nella partita col Portogallo a Yakin venne la geniale idea di sostituire Elvedi, cui ho visto annullare Lukaku, e non era difficile, ma anche Haaland, ed era meno facile, con un giocatore secondo lui pi√π propositivo. Risultato: 6-1 del Portogallo. Anche il Belgio di de Bruyne ha il suo problema. E si chiama Romelu Lukaku, che √® capace di sbagliare tre gol solo davanti al portiere. Come si fa a sbagliare tre gol soli davanti al portiere? Si tira addosso al portiere, elementare Watson. Ripetendo un‚Äôimpresa fatta in precedenza quando, servito da De Bruyne, attualmente il miglior assistman del mondo, sbagli√≤ tre gol solo davanti al portiere. Ma √® mai possibile che nessuno dei commentatori riesca a non dire mai la verit√† e cio√® che Romelu Lukaku √® una pippa? Il livello di questi Europei √® infimo. Non c‚Äô√® una squadra che emerge. La Spagna certo, ma giocava contro nessuno, cio√® un‚ÄôItalia che cos√¨ scombicchierata non si poteva nemmeno immaginare. Ma anche la Spagna ha un suo problema che si chiama Alvaro Morata, molto discusso in terra iberica e che del resto, giocando per la Juventus, non ha mai dato grandi dimostrazioni di s√©. Contro la Croazia, l‚ÄôItalia l‚Äôha sfangata per il rotto della cuffia. Del resto la Croazia √® il cimitero degli elefanti, con Modric, 38 anni, Perisic, 36 anni, Brozovic, 31 anni, che furono grandi, soprattutto Modric, ma in un‚Äôepoca pleistocenica. Sui serbi non si pu√≤ mai fare alcun affidamento. Hanno fra i migliori giocatori nei campionati europei ma prima delle partite si ubriacano e vanno a puttane (...)
